bike.description: NEW Fuji T-T High Modulus C-7 carbon w/RIB Tech, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, Integrates Aero seat tube, Internalcable routing, Oversized PIIS BB shell,  Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XS(50cm), S(52cm), M(54cm), M/L(56cm), L(58cm), XL(60cm)

components.description: High Modulus C-7 carbon thin seat stays, Oversized chain stay w/ETC and forged alloy drop out w/replaceable hanger
NEW Fuji FC-330 Carbon Monocoque w/RIB Tech & Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer
Shimano Dura Ace HollowTech II w/ Integrated Spindle, 39/53T
Shimano Dura Ace STI shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Shimano Dura Ace dual pivot w/cartridge pads
FSA No. 42 1 1/8"U- 1 1/2"L Integrated, w/Carbon convex topcap
Prologo C.ONE50-Ti Carbon base w/Hollow Ti rail
